game.title: The Sunken City's Legacy
game.objective: Discover the sunken city and recover the ancient artifacts
game.description: Embark on a perilous quest to uncover the sunken city, where ancient artifacts hold great power.
game.reward: 50,000 gems and an ancient artifact chest

task.description: Submerge into the depths of the Crystal Lagoon in Seabrook and locate the underwater map to navigate the sunken city's ruins.
Traverse the treacherous waters of the Serpent's Pass to reach the Sunken Temple, hidden beneath the waves.
Face off against the ancient guardians guarding the temple entrance, testing your courage and skill.
Successfully navigate the chambers and uncover the chest containing the ancient artifacts. Remember to be cautious of陷阱!
